response.overview: On the five dvd's of this boxset you're taken back to the living room of the seventies. You're shown what came into the room during this turbulent era, mainly through our TV set. Which programmes were popular, which artists, which presenters, but mainly: what did they look like again? But also: what kept us occupied, what were the main news stories from that time? This 7-hour journey across the 70's brings it all very close again and you will be thrown back to that exciting time: the seventies!
response.title: Testament in beeld: Seventies
